description: Detects execution of Remote Utilities RAT (RURAT) from an unusual location (outside of 'C:\Program Files')
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Remote Access Tool - RURAT Execution From Unusual Location
query: (((process.executable.text:("*\\rutserv.exe" OR "*\\rfusclient.exe")) OR (Product:"Remote Utilities")) AND (NOT process.executable.text:("C\:\\Program\ Files\\Remote\ Utilities*" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Remote\ Utilities*")))
